General.Name: Fu Burg Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Fu Burg Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells adult diapers in Taiwan. It offers adult care products, such as adult diapers, pull on products, insert pads, under pads, and wet wipes; and female care products, including sanitary napkins and breast pads, as well as incontinence pads, panty liners, and maternity pads. The company also provides infant care products comprising baby diapers, underpads, wipes, wet towels, etc. In addition, it offers skin care products, such as facial masks under the Mori brand name. Additionally, the company provides condoms, medical devices, tissue papers, cotton pads, paper cups, paper plates, and various kinds of paper processed products. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.130, Zhongxiao East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10053
